page.title: 15GEOGRAPHY AND ENVIRONMENT
page.content: Our area of Llanelli is very low with many areas actually lying below sea level.This has resulted in areas of marshland and large areas of uncultivated non-woodland vegetation. In some cases the land has been developed to accomodate large industrial complexes such as Trostre Tinplate Works and the Texaco Chemical Works,in other cases roads and railways have been driven through the grassland but most of it has been left untouched. The residential areas have been built on the slightly higher ground-between 30m and 46m above sea level.
